item.title: Changing Colour of a teleporting tablet?
item.dc:creator: @Enyo Enyo
item.description:
@Enyo wrote:

is it possible to change the colour of a teleport tablet heres the code

} if(i == 17001) { class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Break";//New option class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 0xffffff; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 128; class8.anInt174 = 12324; class8.anInt190 = 500; class8.anInt181 = 440; class8.anInt169 = 0; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.aBoolean176 = true; class8.aString170 = "Smithing Teleport"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A Teleportation Tablet to the smithing Area".getBytes(); }

What would i have to change to change the colour and what are the codes for RED GREEN and YELLOW? thanks so much if you can help.

Read full topic
